New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers became the sixth NBA team to start a season 13-0
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored 11 of his 23 points in the final three minutes
Mitchell hit three 3-pointers with less than three minutes to play
Pre-Game Insights: Philadelphia 76ers played without Paul George and Joel Embiid
Nick Nurse mentioned Paul George's minutes restriction would be lifted for the next game
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland Cavaliers' coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
The team ended a 20-year championship drought
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland Cavaliers have won 13 in a row for the fourth time in franchise history
This was the 100th meeting between the two rival teams
